1.Strategy: To responsibly use AI while executing the implementations outlined in the strategy for various value areas, we need to consider the applications based on their Risk & Complexity vs Impact graph and determine their Horizon classification based on timelines and effort for implementation.

applications.description: AI-powered automation to streamline claims processing and enhance engineering tooling governance.
Develop AI models to forecast engineering market trends and customer behavior for strategic planning.
